content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. As the landlord, I am seeking to rent out the property at the highest possible price. What rental price are you willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. Can we negotiate on it?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Of course, we can negotiate on the rental price. What is your proposed rental price for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 400 Euros per month.

Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price. I am willing to pay 400 Euros per month. Can we negotiate on it?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max. Thank you for your offer of 400 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment. As the landlord, I am seeking to maximize my gains, so I am afraid I cannot accept your proposal. However, I am open to discussing a higher rental price that would better reflect the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to consider a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
